DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to 1) evaluate the extent of absorption of a single dose of a pregabalin controlled release tablet with and without coadministration of erythromycin and 2) evaluate the safety and tolerability of a single dose of a pregabalin controlled release tablet with and without coadministration of erythromycin.
DOC.brief_title: An Investigation of the Effects of Erythromycin on the Pharmacokinetics of the Pregabalin Controlled Release Tablet
DOC.detailed_description: Evaluate the absorption, pharmacokinetics, safety/tolerability of a single dose of a pregabalin CR tablet with and without erythromycin
DOC.criteria: Healthy male or females Between the ages of 18 and 55 years, inclusive Body Mass Index (BMI) of 17.5 to 30.5 kg/m2 Illicit drug use Pregnant or nursing females Females of childbearing potential who are unwilling or unable to use an acceptable method of contraception
